content.question: A box of mass <math alttext="M" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is sliding along a rough surface with initial velocity <math alttext="v" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. After traveling a distance <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> it comes to rest due to the friction between the box and the ground. What is the coefficient of kinetic friction between the box and the ground?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction v squared over 2 g x, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>g</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 2 v squared over M g x, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>M</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 2 v squared over g x, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>g</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 2 v over M g x, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>M</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="the fraction v over 2 g x, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>g</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction v squared over 2 g x, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>g</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
